title: Refund of payments
context: [ยง663-23 Refund of payments.] If such action results in a final judgment for defendant, plaintiff, upon receipt of a written demand, shall refund to defendant or defendant&rsquo;s insurance company any advance payment made to or for the plaintiff by defendant or defendant&rsquo;s insurance company. [L 1969, c 233, ยง3; gen ch 1985]
